item.title: Mongolian grammar terms 2: Inflexions
item.description: Inflexions 词形变化 Src: J. Gaunt. 采自J. Gaunt的书。 Inflexions / 缀加成分 Explantion 解释 1. -аа reflexive (added to nouns): means possession or intimacy 名词的反身后缀, 表示拥有或者亲密的关系 2. аа emphatic (.. to verbs): show emphasis) 加在动词后边，以示强调 3. -аа present continuos tense; little used; mostly used for байх 现在进行时；不常用；多用在байх 4. -аа causative form of certain verbs 一些动词的使动态 5. -aaгүй past tense negative of 3.

item.title: Mongolian grammar terms 1
item.description: Nouns’ cases; 名词的格 Cases (Тийн ялгал, т. я. in short)/格 Explantion 解释 1. тарах тийн ялгал. ablative case 从比格 2. заах т. я. accusative case (=objective case) 宾格 3. нэрлэх т. я. nominative case 主格 4. өгөх орших т. я. dative-locative case 向位格(给在格) 5. үйлдэх т. я. instrumental case 工具格(凭借格,用让格) 6. хамтрах т. я.
